title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreshore (Transfer of Departmental
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreshore (Transfer of Departmental 

Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2024. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 14 May 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited foreshore (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2024 (2) order come operation 14 may 2024

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government 

and Heritage by or under the provisions of the – 

(a) Foreshore Act 1933 (No. 12 of 1933) in so far as the functions 
relate only to the functions of the appropriate Minister referred to 
in section 1B (c) of that Act, 

(b) Foreshore (Amendment) Act 1992 (No. 17 of 1992), and 

(c) Fisheries (Amendment) Act 2003 (No. 21 of 2003), 

transferred 

are 
Communications. 

to 

the Minister 

for 

the Environment, Climate and 

(2) References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
functions transferred by this Article shall, from the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications, the name of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [236] 3 

Heritage shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred by 
this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for the 
Environment, Climate and Communications or added in the proceedings, as may 
be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such 
substitution.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
may, in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister 
for the Environment, Climate and Communications, be carried on or completed 
on or after such commencement by the Minister for the Environment, Climate 
and Communications.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister housing local government heritage may far relates function transferred order minister environment climate communication carried completed commencement minister environment climate communication

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister environment climate communication

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
contained in the constitution of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.
text_norm: 7 reference minister housing local government heritage contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister environment climate communication

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage, in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications 
and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on 
such commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for the 
Environment, Climate and Communications, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
the Environment, Climate and Communications by this Article which, on the 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage shall, on the request of the Minister 
for the Environment, Climate and Communications, be transferred into the name 
of the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [236] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
